results.purpose: Conversion analysis tool for TPT (The Purple Taco) tracking funnel performance, channel effectiveness, and conversion rates
key_data_points: Landing page to quiz conversion rates

entities.name: TPT
entities.context: Primary brand being analyzed for conversion performance

entities.name: HFG brands
entities.context: Brand group used for conversion rate comparison

entities.name: Cade
entities.context: Action owner - checking with First Media on LP to Quiz mCVR drop (March to April/May) and competitor CTA copy

entities.name: Maria
entities.context: Action owner - creating a view (incomplete action item)

entities.name: First Media
entities.context: Data source or partner for funnel conversion data

insights: Tool provides 5 distinct analytical views covering weekly trends, channel performance, funnel analysis, and competitive benchmarking
Interactive funnel view exists in both blended and channel-specific versions for granular analysis
Identified performance issue: micro-conversion drop from Landing Page to Quiz between March and April/May
Cross-channel comparison capability allows identification of channel-specific funnel weaknesses
Action items from April 1st meeting indicate focus on funnel optimization and competitive analysis
Tool enables both time-based (weekly/monthly) and comparative (channel vs channel, brand vs brand) analysis
